definitions.definition: A person, especially a Native American , who cultivates and harvests rice.
A utensil used to extrude soft foods (especially, cooked potato) through holes about the diameter of a grain of rice.
An automobile, especially one imported from an Oriental country, deemed inferior or cheap, that has been modified with after-market parts in order to appear more powerful or sporty.
A person who drives such an automobile.

main_definition: ( US ) A person, especially a Native American , who cultivates and harvests rice.
secondary_definitions: ( cooking ) A utensil used to extrude soft foods (especially, cooked potato) through holes about the diameter of a grain of rice.

( slang , US , derogatory ) An automobile, especially one imported from an Oriental country, deemed inferior or cheap, that has been modified with after-market parts in order to appear more powerful or sporty.
( slang , derogatory ) A person who drives such an automobile.
